title: Did ‘Barrage’ Chaos Change Outcome at Liège? ‘That Group got 20 Seconds for Free’
content:
A crash with about 100km to go split the bunch, and riders like Pidcock, Vansevenant bridged across alone, while others later paced through the team cars: 'I went really deep there. I killed my legs.'

Read the full article at Did ‘Barrage’ Chaos Change Outcome at Liège? ‘That Group got 20 Seconds for Free’ on Velo.
author: ahood
